summary: A documentary that questions the cost -- and value -- of higher education in the United States.
cast: Elizabeth Armstrong|Richard Arum|Jamshed Bharucha|David Boone|Jerry Brown|Peter Buckley|Anthony Carnevale|Clayton Christensen|Michael Crow|Andrew Delbanco|Drew Gilpin Faust|Peter Hadreaas|Laura Hamilton|John Hennessy|Ellen Junn|Anya Kamenetz|Daphne Koller|Ann Larson|Rita Manning|John Owens|Michael Roth|Peter Schiff|Jeff Selingo|Victoria Sobel|Elizabeth Stark|Dale Stephens|Mitchell Stevens|Teresa Sullivan|Beverly Tatum|Peter Thiel|Sebastian Thrun
title: Ivory Tower
